title: Taking the bull by its horns
description: In April 2025, SEBI found that the American trading firm Jane Street was allegedly manipulating the equity derivatives market in India. However, in 2024, the regulator found that up to 93% of traders in this subset of the financial market lost money, yet continued to buy into it. Ashokamithran T. speaks to traders and analysts to understand how complex financial products in the derivatives market and algorithm-trading stack the odds against individual traders

title: The death of a lake, and recurring flood nightmare in Warangal

title: Beijing files WTO suit against Canada, opposes EU sanctions on Iran
description: China has escalated its trade dispute with Canada by filing a lawsuit at the World Trade Organization challenging import restrictions on steel, alleging they are protectionist measures violating WTO rules. This action follows China's recent imposition of new duties on Canadian canola. Simultaneously, China expressed opposition to reimposing sanctions on Iran regarding its nuclear program.
content: China has escalated its trade dispute with Canada by filing a lawsuit at the World Trade Organization challenging import restrictions on steel, alleging they are protectionist measures violating WTO rules. This action follows China's recent imposition of new duties on Canadian canola. Simultaneously, China expressed opposition to reimposing sanctions on Iran regarding its nuclear program.
text_combined: Beijing files WTO suit against Canada, opposes EU sanctions on Iran China has escalated its trade dispute with Canada by filing a lawsuit at the World Trade Organization challenging import restrictions on steel, alleging they are protectionist measures violating WTO rules. This action follows China's recent imposition of new duties on Canadian canola. Simultaneously, China expressed opposition to reimposing sanctions on Iran regarding its nuclear program.

title: 川普稱任內習近平保證不犯台 中使館：美應慎重處理台灣問題 ｜ 公視新聞網 PNN
description: 美國總統川普（Donald Trump）15日在前往阿拉斯加與俄羅斯總統蒲亭會面前，向媒體透露，中國國家主席習近平曾跟他說，只要川普在任美國總統，就不會入侵台灣。而學者分析，這可能是川普彰顯個人「外交強硬風格」的表述，即便習近平的承諾屬實，也幾乎不具任何價值。

title: 教育部估13年前龍年紅利消失 118學年國小生人數將跌破百萬 ｜ 公視新聞網 PNN
description: 受到少子化影響，教育部預估，隨著13年前龍年出生的子女進入國中，國小生的人數高峰期已過，之後總人數將一路下探。對此，全教總喊話教育部因應實況調整班級人數，實現個別化教學。不過，教育部表示，變動情形仍要視未來出生人數，以及學生數的趨勢來決定。

title: 雙和醫院急診貼護病比1:13公告 衛福部：急診不納護病比計算 ｜ 公視新聞網 PNN
description: 新北市雙和醫院近日被發現在急診室門口貼字條，表示「本急診目前護病比1比13」，遠高於規定的1比6，引發關注。不過實際了解，急診室不納入護病比計算當中。雙和醫院則澄清，是因為當天急診收治病人爆量、等待時間較長，才會貼出字條，希望民眾體諒。17日下午衛福部長邱泰源也表示，會繼續研究策略調配病患，解決急診壅塞狀況。

description: 桃園新屋的永安工業區，附近居民抱怨東北季風吹拂，空污影響當地，希望市府有具體作為。桃園市環保局回應，已在該區裝設22組空品微型感測器，並鎖定特定污染源加強稽查。

title: 北市新生高架橋見裂痕 市府稱是伸縮縫及灌漿接縫 ｜ 公視新聞網 PNN
description: 台北新生高架橋已經通車超過40年，近期卻有網友發現，高架橋疑似有不小的裂痕，趕緊通報市府。台北市新工處回應，這不是裂痕而是橋梁「伸縮縫」，也強調市府從2021年起就有設置監測系統，數據長期呈現穩定，橋梁結構安全無虞。

title: 高雄鼓山獼猴頻闖屋搶食 專家：可製造聲響嚇跑 ｜ 公視新聞網 PNN
description: 高雄柴山獼猴因為長期被人餵食，數量愈來愈多，而且還不怕人，附近社區更不時傳出有獼猴闖入民宅覓食。專家建議，除了住家的門窗周圍避免放置食物，若一旦獼猴真的闖入，則可拿掃把或物品敲擊地面，透過聲響將獼猴嚇跑。

title: 彰化老翁及議員遭獒犬攻擊送醫 飼主致歉稱狗籠沒關好所致 ｜ 公視新聞網 PNN
description: 彰化發生猛犬攻擊事件，一位71歲老翁15日在二林一處公園散步時，突然被一隻「加納利獒犬」攻擊，當時縣議員見狀上前制止，卻也被波及，造成雙腿及手部多處咬傷，兩人送醫治療後都沒有大礙。動防所表示，將了解飼主管理情形，若有違反《動保法》，將依法開罰。

title: 郵局警示帳戶逐年增 4至5成異常帳戶未被提早辨識 ｜ 公視新聞網 PNN
description: 政府將普發現金1萬元，傳出有郵局窗口人員發現，開戶的長輩變多了。中華郵政回應，開戶數沒有明顯增加，但已經加強開戶審查機制。根據審計部統計，郵局存款帳戶、新開戶，1年內轉為警示帳戶有逐年遞增趨勢。專家表示，如果碰上有人請你申辦人頭戶、轉交證件等資料，就要留意有可能是詐騙。

title: 莊瑞雄批屏東放核廢成二等公民 童子賢：清廉環保者皆一流公民 ｜ 公視新聞網 PNN
description: 8月23日將舉行重啟核三公投，17日正方代表把握投票前最後一個週末，舉行連署記者會，和碩聯合科技董事長童子賢強調，AI跟高效運算產業需要穩定電力支撐。而針對核廢料存放議題，童子賢跟民進黨立委莊瑞雄持續隔空交火；民眾黨主席黃國昌也再向民進黨主席賴清德下辯論戰帖。
content: 8月23日將舉行重啟核三公投，17日正方代表把握投票前最後一個週末，舉行連署記者會，和碩聯合科技董事長童子賢強調，AI跟高效運算產業需要穩定電力支撐。而針對核廢料存放議題，童子賢跟民進黨立委莊瑞雄持續隔空交火；民眾黨主席黃國昌也再向民進黨主席賴清德下辯論戰帖。

title: Heena Kang wins maiden pro title at 11th Leg of Hero WPGT
description: Bengaluru: Heena Kang, who was four shots ahead with eight holes left, did well to keep her nerves in check to par the last eight holes and win the 11h Leg of the Hero Women’s Pro Golf Tour at the Prestige Golfshire. Heena, who was fifth on her pro debut last month, was chased hard by amateur Lavanya Gupta, who was playing in the same final group.Lavanya, who started the final day two shots behind Heena, had fallen five behind as she was 4-over by the turn. And then there was a great charge from Lavanya, who birdied the 11th, 14th and the 16th. Needing one more birdie to force a play-off...

title: PGTI Players Championship 2025: Yuvraj Sandhu prevails over Udayan Mane in marathon playoff for back-to-back wins
description: Hosur: Yuvraj Sandhu prevailed over Udayan Mane in a marathon playoff that lasted five extra holes to win the INR 1 crore PGTI Players Championship 2025 played at the Clover Greens Golf Course and Resort near Hosur in Tamil Nadu.Both Yuvraj, the overnight leader by three shots, and Udayan, who was overnight second, ended the regulation 72 holes with identical totals of 28-under 256 that pushed the match into a dramatic playoff.Twenty-eight-year-old Chandigarh resident Yuvraj (63-67-61-65), also the winner in Mysuru last week, thus registered back-to-back titles and took a commanding lead in the...

title: Women’s Delhi Premier League: North Delhi Strikers pip East Delhi Riders by 2 Runs in rain-affected clash
description: New Delhi: The North Delhi Strikers pulled off a nail-biting 2-run win against East Delhi Riders in a rain-curtailed Women’s Delhi Premier League fixture at the Arun Jaitley Stadium on Friday.Batting first in a 17-over-per-side contest, the Strikers posted a competitive 118/5. Skipper Ayushi Soni led from the front with a well-compiled 40 off 31 balls, while Laxmi Yadav anchored the innings with an unbeaten 48 off 34, finishing strongly alongside Archana, who chipped in with a brisk 14* off 8.For the Riders, Sumiti Soni was the standout bowler with 3/15 in 3 overs, while Mayuri provided good...
